name: Mio
headline: Mio powers seamless communication between workplace chat apps.
description: Mio powers seamless communication between Slack, Microsoft Teams & Webex Teams. The Austin, Texas-based company was founded by Tom Hadfield and James Cundle in November 2015. M.io has raised $12m from investors including Goldcrest Capital, Eniac Ventures, Two Sigma Ventures, Khosla Ventures, Y Combinator and Capital Factory. Ready to sync your teams? Learn more and get started at https://m.io/

founders.name: James Cundle, Founder/CTO
founders.description: Security first engineer with multi-stack and devops experience applied to multiple verticals over the last 20+ years.  Excellent track record of delivering projects for creative business thinkers. Big picture awareness, rapid prototype and forward thinker in fast moving, small team environments. Solid lead in delivering SOC2 Type I and II compliance in a start up environment.

founders.name: Tom Hadfield, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Tom Hadfield is a British entrepreneur whose first company, Soccernet.com, was sold to ESPN for $40 million when he was 17 years old. Today, Tom is the CEO of Mio, an enterprise messaging startup based in Austin, Texas backed by Y Combinator, Khosla Ventures and Capital Factory. Tom graduated from Harvard University in 2008 and he is a board member at Heifer International, a charity working to end hunger and poverty around the world.

# Interoperability for Google Workspace and Microsoft 365
Mio enables chat and file sharing interoperability for teams powered by Google and Microsoft.
[Contact sales](http://m.io/</contact-sales>)
Explore our product
![Down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dc650c8e42ad4c8fb65fcc_expand_more.svg)
[Directory Sync](http://m.io/</products/directory-sync>)[Chat Sync](http://m.io/</products/chat-sync>)[File Sync](http://m.io/</products/file-sync>)[Calendar Sync](http://m.io/<#>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dc68a10a45e07e557c7f87_mio-brand-left.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dc68a1db5e8dce5fc7aa27_mio-brand-right.svg)
## Say goodbye to missed messages and communication silos
Mio helps siloed teams discover and communicate with each other by relaying messages between Google Chat and Microsoft Teams in real time.
![Decorative image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dc8ca69cd28bfbcc7a1f14_yt-left.svg)![Decorative image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dc8ca65861e0563e1cfda4_yt-right.svg)
![Decorative image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/660bd21ea7512325092f5806_interop-1.webp)![Decorative image](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/660bd21e7dbb9e401dcd1b0d_interop-2.webp)
## Synchronize users, chat, and files across platforms
Google Workspace and Microsoft 365 coexistence in four key areas:
[![Directory Sync](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65df3c6323c73271f055ed7c_Directory%20Sync.svg)Directory Sync![Right arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dc93bb213ee930bc9d9664_arrow-blue.svg)Set up and maintain a bidirectional user directory to make users discoverable for cross-platform collaboration.](http://m.io/</products/directory-sync>)[![Chat Sync](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65df3c9429f0ed36d470640c_Chat%20Sync.svg)Chat Sync![Right arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dc93bb213ee930bc9d9664_arrow-blue.svg)Connect users and allow them to be discoverable for cross-platform messaging in channels and direct chats.](http://m.io/</products/chat-sync>)[![File Sync](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65df3c9b05517909101776a0_File%20Sync.svg)File Sync![Right arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dc93bb213ee930bc9d9664_arrow-blue.svg)Share Google Drive and SharePoint links across platforms to avoid silos and file management issues.](http://m.io/</products/file-sync>)[![Chat Sync](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/67161f649153d77f798accd8_Calendar%20Sync.svg)Calendar Sync![Right arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dc93bb213ee930bc9d9664_arrow-blue.svg)Synchronize calendars across platforms to improve visibility for scheduling and to ensure meetings are never missed.](http://m.io/</products/calendar-sync>)
## The world's top enterprises rely on Mio for interoperability
![Broadcom logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/6603565a3115827e35a129eb_broadcom.png)
![Sutherland logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/660355f99e0a6519023487ef_sutherland.png)
![G2 logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/660137650dc2b4f203c3664a_g2.png)
![Farmers Insurance logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/660356549211971e7c398afa_farmers-insurance.webp)
![ClearChoice](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/67228fa4015c56413245f26f_Color_Primary.svg)
![SAIA logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/6603565462c9b837fc8d9b7a_saia.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/672d0af2908474d88e62b726_Kaplan-logo.png)
![Duo logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/660356a5084c42b29ccfeb88_duo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/6769980172e42e362ae77f7a_insight-logo-9585DB9EFF-seeklogo.com.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/6769984e1557aaacd01b7b31_crisil.png)
## Unlock the benefits of cross-platform collaboration for your entire organization
[Unified collaborationDifferent teams rely on different platforms to collaborate. Mio unifies teams by enabling them to chat in the same spaces, group chats, and direct messages, regardless of platform.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/66061bedffb8ccf63f3853af_Unified%20collaboration-2.webp)](http://m.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[No change managementMaintain existing workflows on the platform you already use. End users do not have to install or learn any new software.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65fd3c11df36044af631c802_Unite%20disparate%20teams.webp)](http://m.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Secure and reliableMio never stores your messages or files. Our team works directly with Google to build and connect the APIs required for a seamless and secure cross-platform experience.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/660278995c762752477052dd_Secure%20and%20reliable.webp)](http://m.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Automated account managementKeeping track of thousands of users on multiple platforms can be a hassle. Mio subscribes to Entra ID groups to automate the process of syncing each user‚Äôs identity.![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65fd3c114012ae2e95f26d51_Automated%20account%20management.webp)](http://m.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/66061bedffb8ccf63f3853af_Unified%20collaboration-2.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65fd3c11df36044af631c802_Unite%20disparate%20teams.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/660278995c762752477052dd_Secure%20and%20reliable.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65fd3c114012ae2e95f26d51_Automated%20account%20management.webp)
## Google‚Äôs official interoperability partner, built with a security-first mindset
![API-based middleware](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dda3a05e24e97358cf8a00_api.svg)
### API-based middleware
Mio works directly with Google to build the APIs that relay information from platform to platform, for a secure and frictionless end user experience.
![Fully native](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dda3a0d7e965c2f0ef12f8_native.svg)
### Fully native
Mio is the only bidirectional and native solution that allows users to stay in their existing platforms and use features they're already familiar with.
![Safe and secure](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65dda3a0eddb6cc5e53858c0_safe.svg)
### Safe and secure
Mio [securely integrates](http://m.io/</security>) with your messaging platforms and never stores messages or files, keeping your data secure and confidential.

## Leading the way in collaboration interoperability
Get expert help and advice about all things chat and collaboration.
[![Visit blog](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65e5bad0748eac5c78bf6a13_blog.png)Mio blogVisit our blog to learn about the latest developments in collaboration interoperability.](http://m.io/</blog/frontline-worker-collaboration>)[![Visit Webinars](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/6607173f6111ab316a4645f4_6605ba32ecd75ddec6573946_NEXT-2024.png)Industry EventGoogle Next: How Mio is bridging the collaboration gap with SADA and Google Workspace](http://m.io/</events/how-mio-is-bridging-the-collaboration-gap-with-sada-and-google-workspace>)[![Visit help center](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65e5b93c2f84aaf385430868_help.svg)HELP CENTERVisit help.m.io for step-by-step guides and best practices.](http://m.io/<https:/help.m.io>)
## Frequently asked questions
Is Mio a chat app?
![Down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65df451ca1ff0f4e03b39ec9_faq-down.svg)
Mio is not a separate chat platform, but rather an integration for your existing Google Chat, Microsoft Teams, Slack, or Zoom Chat applications. Organizations will need to install the Mio app onto their respective chat platforms in order to enable cross-platform communications.
Does Mio migrate chat history?
![Down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65df451ca1ff0f4e03b39ec9_faq-down.svg)
Mio is not a chat migration tool. However, if your organization plans on migrating from one chat platform to another, we recommend using Mio during your migration period so that you can retain as many messages as possible. Mio is not able to transfer any previously sent messages or chat history.
Does Mio work with other chat platforms?
![Down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65df451ca1ff0f4e03b39ec9_faq-down.svg)
Mio is built to interoperate Google, Microsoft, Slack, or Zoom.
Does Mio store any messages?
![Down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65df451ca1ff0f4e03b39ec9_faq-down.svg)
Mio does not persistently store user messages or files. Message metadata is retained by Mio for future reconciliation across platforms. However, the underlying messages and files are not permanently retained.
What if I need to use Mio to connect with external contacts?
![Down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65df451ca1ff0f4e03b39ec9_faq-down.svg)
Mio currently only supports interoperability for organizations that need to connect their internal teams.
How do I pronounce Mio?
![Down arrow](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65df451ca1ff0f4e03b39ec9_faq-down.svg)
It's pronounced MEE-oh, not MY-oh üòÑ

End users do not have to install or learn any new software.![‚ü®35‚ü©](http://m.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)Secure and reliableMio never stores your messages or files. Our team works directly with Google to build and connect the APIs required for a seamless and secure cross-platform experience.![‚ü®36‚ü©](http://m.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)Automated account managementKeeping track of thousands of users on multiple platforms can be a hassle. Mio subscribes to Entra ID groups to automate the process of syncing each user‚Äôs identity.![‚ü®37‚ü©](http://m.io/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/66061bedffb8ccf63f3853af_Unified%20collaboration-2.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65fd3c11df36044af631c802_Unite%20disparate%20teams.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/660278995c762752477052dd_Secure%20and%20reliable.webp)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/62ccccd9c505ff91c1a567f4/65fd3c114012ae2e95f26d51_Automated%20account%20management.webp)
## Google‚Äôs official interoperability partner, built with a security-first mindset
![API-based middleware‚ü®38‚ü©]
### API-based middleware
Mio works directly with Google to build the APIs that relay information from platform to platform, for a secure and frictionless end user experience.
![Fully native‚ü®39‚ü©]
### Fully native
Mio is the only bidirectional and native solution that allows users to stay in their existing platforms and use features they're already familiar with.
![Safe and secure‚ü®40‚ü©]
### Safe and secure
Mio securely integrates‚ü®12‚ü© with your messaging platforms and never stores messages or files, keeping your data secure and confidential.

## Leading the way in collaboration interoperability
Get expert help and advice about all things chat and collaboration.
![Visit blog‚ü®50‚ü©Mio blogVisit our blog to learn about the latest developments in collaboration interoperability.](http://m.io/</blog/frontline-worker-collaboration>)![Visit Webinars‚ü®51‚ü©Industry EventGoogle Next: How Mio is bridging the collaboration gap with SADA and Google Workspace](http://m.io/</events/how-mio-is-bridging-the-collaboration-gap-with-sada-and-google-workspace>)![Visit help center‚ü®52‚ü©HELP CENTERVisit help.m.io for step-by-step guides and best practices.](http://m.io/<https:/help.m.io>)
## Frequently asked questions
Is Mio a chat app?
![Down arrow‚ü®53‚ü©]
Mio is not a separate chat platform, but rather an integration for your existing Google Chat, Microsoft Teams, Slack, or Zoom Chat applications. Organizations will need to install the Mio app onto their respective chat platforms in order to enable cross-platform communications.
Does Mio migrate chat history?
![Down arrow‚ü®53‚ü©]
Mio is not a chat migration tool. However, if your organization plans on migrating from one chat platform to another, we recommend using Mio during your migration period so that you can retain as many messages as possible. Mio is not able to transfer any previously sent messages or chat history.
Does Mio work with other chat platforms?
![Down arrow‚ü®53‚ü©]
Mio is built to interoperate Google, Microsoft, Slack, or Zoom.
Does Mio store any messages?
![Down arrow‚ü®53‚ü©]
Mio does not persistently store user messages or files. Message metadata is retained by Mio for future reconciliation across platforms. However, the underlying messages and files are not permanently retained.
What if I need to use Mio to connect with external contacts?
![Down arrow‚ü®53‚ü©]
Mio currently only supports interoperability for organizations that need to connect their internal teams.
How do I pronounce Mio?
![Down arrow‚ü®53‚ü©]
It's pronounced MEE-oh, not MY-oh üòÑ

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Mio**

**Mission**: Mio is all about enabling seamless communication across various workplace chat applications. Think of it as your digital interpreter, ensuring that teams using different platforms can effortlessly collaborate without the headaches of interoperability issues.

**Founding & Background**: Founded in November 2015 by Tom Hadfield and James Cundle, Mio is based in Austin, Texas. The company first focused on bridging the gap between major chat services like Slack, Microsoft Teams, and Webex Teams, effectively tearing down communication silos. They‚Äôve successfully raised $12 million from prominent investors, including Y Combinator (they were part of the Batch W16), Two Sigma Ventures, Khosla Ventures, and others.

**Team**: With a compact team of just 12 employees, Mio operates with the agility of a startup, allowing for quick iterations and innovations.

**Services & Features**:
1. **Interoperability**: Mio enables real-time communication between Google Chat, Microsoft Teams, and other major platforms. No more missed messages or fragmented conversations!
2. **Core Products**: They offer a suite of synchronization tools:
   - **Directory Sync**: Allows for bidirectional user directories for enhanced discoverability.
   - **Chat Sync**: Facilitates messaging across platforms, ensuring everyone stays connected.
   - **File Sync**: Supports sharing files without worrying about where they originated.
   - **Calendar Sync**: Synchronizes calendars to keep everyone aligned on meetings and schedules.

**Enterprise Solutions**: Mio‚Äôs technology has been adopted by some of the world‚Äôs leading companies, enhancing their collaborative capabilities without the need for users to adopt new chat software. It's particularly useful during mergers and acquisitions or when different teams need long-term coexistence on various platforms.

**Security & Data Handling**: A standout feature of Mio is its commitment to security; they never store users' messages or files, ensuring confidentiality while allowing for streamlined communications. The integration is fully API-based, working directly with Google to maintain this security.

**Community & Support**: Mio doesn‚Äôt just stop at providing tools; they also offer resources through their blog and customer stories, and they maintain an active presence in the tech community. Their aim is to keep businesses informed about the advancements in collaboration interoperability.

**Conclusion**: Mio is more than just a communication tool; it‚Äôs a game-changer for organizations navigating the complex landscape of workplace communications. If your teams are stuck in a chat silo, it might be time to consider Mio and boost your collaboration strategy.

For more information, check out their [website](http://m.io).
